filter.name: colorbox
filter.label: Colorbox
filter.instructions: Select the color of the box to use in the parameters field.This will be applied to the selectd text in the editor.

filter.name: delicious
filter.label: del.icio.us tag cloud
filter.instructions: Enter your del.icio.us username within the tags to create a tag cloud of your bookmarked URL's.

filter.name: embed
filter.label: Embed
filter.instructions: Make a link of the text between the embed tags to embed a file from your filemanager. Supported formats are: mp3, ogg, mp4 for both audio and video files.

filter.name: flash video simple
filter.label: Flash Video (FLV) simple
filter.instructions: Provide the URL of a flash video. Size of the video will be 340 x 240

input.inputparam: Provide the URL of a flash video. Size of the video will be 340 x 240

filter.name: flash video complex
filter.label: Flash Video (FLV) complex
filter.instructions: Modify the url, width and height parameters to control the size of the flash video file (FLV) to be embedded in the content

filter.name: IFrame
filter.label: IFrame
filter.instructions: Inserts a page via URL into a content box. Please specify url|width|height as parameters

input.inputparam: Enter the url for the iframe, with and height in format url|width|height. Example; www.example.com|400|300
